column4: i am trying to make a script that logs onto a server and executes some ssh commands. i don't want the script to use any passwords whatsoever, so I created a public/private key pair. everything works fine, except that the script still needs a password the first time it gets executed. do you know what I should do to avoid that?
when you create the keypair, don't use a passphrase maybe....?
i've already done this, but the problem is that it *still* wants the account's passphrase
